name: Dirtboy
description:
This game was made and designed as part of the Final Approach Project in CMGT at Saxion University. Its a "fireboy and watergirl" inspired, physics-based puzzle game, where you grow/shrink and shoot your way to the legendary altar. There's also a promotional website made in HTML, that you can check out.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - Move
  • Space - Jumo
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Mouse- Shoot

Made by Team Mossy Froggs

  • Designers:
    • Dan Markov
    • Hansje Dispa
  • Artists:
    • Allan Bukowski
    • Allen Tvetkov
    • Luuk Spijkerboer
  • Engineers:
    • marsmaantje
    • Satos Bril

Special thanks to Lyubomir Kotsev for making custom music!
